original_title: Thou Shalt Not Print Marks Upon Thee
overview: The book of Leviticus says "Thou Shalt Not Print Marks Upon Thee", stating that the punishment shall be stoning! Well, we decided that boning would be a much better option for this group of sinners. Many sacrificial offerings of hot cum are given to their tight donation boxes after sodomizing every hole of these ink covered sluts.
title: Thou Shalt Not Print Marks Upon Thee
